title: [Team CeltiCraft] Valdrine, Journey of Hallucination - 瓦尔德林，幻象之旅
author: LocusAzzurro
txt_content:
本帖最后由 LocusAzzurro 于 2016-12-11 17:32 编辑 

瓦尔德林，幻象之旅Valdrine, Journey of Hallucination
 作品介绍 

各位好

很荣幸向你们展示我们的最新作品：瓦尔德林，幻象之旅。我们花费了三个月的时间制作这张地图。这对我们来说是个莫大的挑战，使我们复习了一遍所有的建筑技巧。这是个迷幻的世界，但不好意思，我们做这个的时候没有吸毒！

一些有趣的事：
大小：1250x850
施工时间3个月
有个有机结构戴着面具（我说过我们不吸毒吗？）
一些灵感来自于音乐
某建筑师因为要在三次元抓粉红兔子而退坑了


Hello everyone 

we are glad to present our last big project : Valdrine, Journey of Hallucination. We worked on this map since 3 months. It was really hard for us, we reviewed our all builds technics for this project. This is a psychedelic world, and unfortunately we didn't take some drugs to build this ! 

Funny to know : 
- Size : 1250x850 
- 3 Months of work 
- One of whose organics is hag with gas mask (Did we tell that we don't take drugs ?) 
- Some inspiration come from Music 
- 1 builder left the project to catch some pink rabbits in real life  
概念与想法：
Artase 
Obeeron 
Cherry_jimbo
